QueryResult.text: SELECT P.ID, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME PARMCODE, NLS.DESCRIPTION PARMLABEL, P.DATA_TYPE DATATYPE, P.PARAM_TYPE SOURCETYPE, P.PARAM_SOURCE SOURCE, P.IS_ACTIVE, P.CREATED_DATE, P.CREATED_BY, P.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, P.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_RPT_PARAMETERS P WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_RPT_PARAMETERS' AND NLS.PK_ID = P.ID
